mapper.insert:
select LAST_INSERT_ID() as id
INSERT INTO craneinspectreport( ) values
(#{item.id},#{item.reportNumber},#{item.unitAddress},#{item.addressId},#{item.organizeCode},#{item.userPoint},#{item.safeManager},#{item.contactPhone},#{item.equipmentVariety},#{item.unitNumber},#{item.manufactureUnit},#{item.manufactureLicenseNumber},#{item.manufactureDate},#{item.specification},#{item.pNumber},#{item.workLevel},#{item.lng},#{item.lat},#{item.singlePicURL},#{item.typePicURL},#{item.ratedLiftWeight})
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM craneinspectreport WHERE ID=#{id}
SELECT cr.*,r.riskValue FROM craneinspectreport cr,riskvalue r WHERE cr.reportnumber=r.reportnumber AND cr.unitAddress=#{unitAddress} GROUP BY cr.equipmentVariety

SELECT
FROM craneinspectreport where unitAddress=#{unitAddress} and equipmentVariety=#{equipmentVariety} group by reportnumber
SELECT round(avg(r.riskvalue)) FROM craneinspectreport cr,riskvalue r WHERE cr.reportnumber=r.reportnumber AND cr.unitAddress=#{unitAddress}

SELECT cr.id,cr.unitAddress,r.riskvalue FROM craneinspectreport cr,riskvalue r,address a WHERE cr.reportnumber=r.reportnumber AND a.id=cr.addressId AND a.city=#{city} AND a.area=#{area} group by cr.unitAddress order by r.riskvalue desc

SELECT cr.*,r.riskvalue FROM craneinspectreport cr,riskvalue r,address a WHERE cr.reportnumber=r.reportnumber AND a.id=cr.addressId AND a.city=#{city} AND a.area=#{area} AND r.riskvalue BETWEEN #{startValue} AND #{endValue} group by cr.unitAddress order by r.riskvalue desc
SELECT * FROM craneinspectreport WHERE unitAddress=#{unitAddress} GROUP BY unitAddress
SELECT *,riskvalue FROM craneinspectreport cr,riskvalue r WHERE cr.reportnumber=r.reportnumber AND cr.id=#{id}
SELECT DISTINCT(equipmentvariety) FROM craneinspectreport
SELECT ROUND(AVG(prs.riskvalue),2) FROM addressriskvalue prs INNER JOIN address a ON prs.addressid=a.id WHERE a.province=#{province}
SELECT ROUND(AVG(prs.riskvalue),2) FROM addressriskvalue prs INNER JOIN address a ON prs.addressid=a.id WHERE a.province=#{province} AND a.city=#{city}
SELECT a.province,ROUND(AVG(prs.riskvalue),2) avgRiskValue FROM addressriskvalue prs,address a WHERE a.id=prs.addressid group by a.province order by avgRiskValue desc
SELECT a.city,ROUND(AVG(prs.riskvalue),2) avgRiskValue FROM addressriskvalue prs,address a WHERE a.id=prs.addressid AND a.province=#{province} group by a.city order by avgRiskValue desc

SELECT a.area,ROUND(AVG(prs.riskvalue),2) avgRiskValue FROM address a,addressriskvalue prs where a.id=prs.addressid AND a.province=#{province} AND a.city=#{city} GROUP BY a.area ORDER BY avgRiskValue DESC

SELECT cr.id,cr.unitAddress,r.riskvalue,cr.equipmentvariety,cr.lng,cr.lat FROM craneinspectreport cr,riskvalue r,address a WHERE cr.reportnumber=r.reportnumber AND a.id=cr.addressId AND a.city=#{city} AND a.area=#{area} AND (cr.unitaddress like #{require} or cr.usepoint like #{require} or cr.safemanager like #{require} or cr.equipmentvariety like #{require} or cr.manufactureunit like #{require}) order by r.riskvalue desc
SELECT cr.*,r.riskvalue FROM craneinspectreport cr,address a,riskvalue r WHERE cr.reportnumber=r.reportnumber AND a.id=cr.addressId AND a.city=#{city} AND a.area=#{area} GROUP BY cr.unitaddress
SELECT pr.province,pr.riskvalue FROM province_riskvalue pr WHERE pr.riskvalue BETWEEN #{startValue} AND #{endValue}

SELECT cr.id,cr.city,cr.riskvalue,r.riskcolor as color FROM city_riskvalue cr,riskcolor r WHERE cr.riskvalue BETWEEN #{startValue} AND #{endValue} AND cr.riskvalue=r.riskvalue AND cr.province=#{province} ORDER BY cr.riskvalue DESC

SELECT a.id,a.area,ar.riskvalue,r.riskcolor as color FROM addressriskvalue ar,address a,riskcolor r WHERE ar.riskvalue BETWEEN #{startValue} AND #{endValue} AND ar.addressId=a.id AND r.riskvalue=ar.riskvalue AND a.province=#{province} AND a.city=#{city} ORDER BY ar.riskvalue DESC
